questions.quote: Okay look, look, let me ask you a question, when they were doing it on stage, was it like really hot?
Question. If I don't care about my watch, can I use it as a weapon?
Okay, I would ring the bell to distract him and then I would knock the gun out of his hand with a Chinese throwing star.
He's downstairs getting the rest of the stuff out of the cab.
That's right. I'm no longer a bride. I'll never be a bride again. Now, I'm just someone's wife!
Only because my parents wanted me to be, I wanted to be a sherrif.
Well that stinks. I was looking forward to us wearing our celebrity tuxes together.
Well, it's because I trust you, you're one of my best friends, and you walked in on me when I was looking at ring brochures.
Fine! Take their advice. No one ever listens to me. When the package is this pretty, no one cares what's inside.
All right, you know that one was coming, but that doesn't mean you have unagi.
